name: Broccoli Cauliflower Soup
ingredients: 1/2 tsp mustard seed, salt, pepper, dried dill, mace
instructions: Cook cauliflower in half the broth 5-8 minutes.
Combine broth, broccoli, seasonings cook 5-8 min.
Saut√© onion in butter till tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until thick and bubbly.
Stir sauce, cauliflower, broccoli and cheese together.
